content: {A扶额无奈}When Isaki came by earlier and asked to buy lots of fruit, I thought he was getting them for his precious beetles.
info: 伊佐奇好感度4级-格连氛围_伊佐奇个人线-CB2

content: Turns out, he was feeding himself...
info: 伊佐奇好感度4级-格连氛围_伊佐奇个人线-CB2

content: A-Anyway, with you and Captain Mo here, I'm sure he'll be just fine. So, what can I do for you today?
